    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">There are no family
relationships among the executive officers listed, and there are no undisclosed
arrangements or understandings under which any of them were appointed as
executive officers. All executive officers of RadioShack Corporation are
appointed by the Board of Directors to serve until their successors are
appointed.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Day was
      appointed Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board of RadioShack
      in July 2006.&#160;&#160;Prior to his appointment, Mr. Day was a private
      investor. Mr. Day became the President and Chief Operating Officer of
      Kmart Corporation in March 2002 and served as Chief Executive Officer of
      Kmart from January 2003 to October 2004. Following the merger of Kmart and
      Sears, Roebuck and Co., Mr. Day served as a Director of Sears Holding
      Corporation (the parent company of Sears, Roebuck and Co. and Kmart
      Corporation) until April 2006. Mr. Day joined Sears as Executive Vice
      President and Chief Financial Officer in 1999, and was promoted to Chief
      Operating Officer and a member of the Office of the Chief Executive, where
      he served until 2002.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="74%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(2)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Bevin was
      appointed Executive Vice President &#8211; Store Operations in January 2008.
      Before joining RadioShack, Mr. Bevin was Senior Vice President, U.S.
      Operations, for Blockbuster Entertainment from January 2006 until October
      2007, and Senior Vice President/General Manager &#8211; Games from June 2005
      until December 2005. Prior to joining Blockbuster, Mr. Bevin was Vice
      President of Retail for Cingular and Managing Director for Interactive
      Telecom Solutions.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>

            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Gooch was
      appointed Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer in August
      2006.&#160;&#160;Previously, Mr. Gooch served as Executive Vice President
      &#8211; Chief Financial Officer of Entertainment Publications from May 2005 to
      August 2006.&#160;&#160;From 1996 to May 2005, Mr. Gooch served in various
      positions at Kmart Corporation, including Vice President, Controller and
      Treasurer, and Vice President, Corporate Financial Planning and
      Analysis.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Whitsett
      was appointed Executive Vice President &#8211; Chief Merchandising Officer in
      December 2007.&#160;&#160;Previously, Mr. Whitsett was Senior Vice
      President, Kmart Merchandising Officer, from July 2005 until November
      2007. He joined Kmart in 1999 as Director, Merchandise Planning &amp;
      Replenishment, and later served as Divisional Vice President, Merchandise
      Planning, Divisional Vice President, Merchandising Consumables, Vice
      President/General Merchandise Manager, Drug Store and Food, and Vice
      President/General Merchandise Manager.</font></div>
            </td>

            <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(5)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Kilinski
      was appointed Senior Vice President &#8211; Marketing and Wireless in July 2007.
      Mr. Kilinski joined RadioShack in 1978 and has served as Vice President -
      Marketing &amp; Wireless, Vice President - Brand Development &amp;
      Communications, Vice President &#8211; Marketing, Vice President - Customer
      Acquisition &amp; Retention, Senior Vice President - Marketing
      Implementation &amp; Services, Senior Division Vice President &amp;
      General Manager - Connecting Places, Senior Division Vice President -
      Strategic Services, Division Vice President - Service &amp; Support, and
      Executive Vice President and Director for AmeriLink Corp. and Nacom
      Corporation, two former wholly-owned subsidiaries of
      RadioShack.</font></div>

            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Ms. Kinzey
      was appointed Senior Vice President &#8211; Information Technology in March
      2006. Before joining RadioShack, Ms. Kinzey served as Vice President &#8211;
      Membership, Member Services and Credit for SAM&#8217;S CLUB and as Vice
      President &#8211; HR/Finance/Corporate Systems and Vice President of Store
      Systems for Wal-Mart Stores, Inc.</font></div>

          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(7)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Ripperton
      was appointed Senior Vice President &#8211; Supply Chain Management in August
      2006. Mr. Ripperton joined RadioShack in 2000 and has served as Vice
      President &#8211; Distribution, Division Vice President - Distribution, Group
      General Manager, and Distribution Center Manager.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="74%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(8)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="74%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Mr. Moad was
      appointed Vice President and Controller in August 2007. He has worked for
      RadioShack for more than 25 years, and has served as Vice President and
      Treasurer, Vice President - Investor Relations, Director - Investor
      Relations, Vice President &#8211; Controller (InterTAN, Inc.), Vice President &#8211;
      Assistant Secretary (InterTAN, Inc.), Assistant Secretary (InterTAN,
      Inc.), Controller &#8211; International Division, and Staff Accountant &#8211;
      International Division.&#160;&#160;InterTAN, Inc., was an NYSE-registered
      spin-off of RadioShack&#8217;s international
units.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">PART
II</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a name="Item5">ITEM 5.</a> MARKET FOR REGISTRANT'S COMMON EQUITY, RELATED
STOCKHOLDER MATTERS AND ISSUER PURCHASES OF EQUITY SECURITIES.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">PRICE
RANGE OF COMMON STOCK</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Our common stock is
listed on the New York Stock Exchange and trades under the symbol "RSH." The
following table presents the high and low trading prices for our common stock,
as reported in the composite transaction quotations of consolidated trading for
issues on the New York Stock Exchange, for each quarter in the two years ended
December 31, 2007.</font></div>

      2006</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">HOLDERS
OF RECORD</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">At
February 15, 2008, there were&#160;19,484 holders of record of our common
stock.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">DIVIDENDS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The
Board of Directors annually reviews our dividend policy. </font>On November 12,
2007, our Board of Directors declared an annual dividend of $0.25 per share. The
dividend was paid on December 19, 2007, to stockholders of record on November
29, 2007.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The following table
sets forth information concerning purchases made by or on behalf of RadioShack
or any affiliated purchaser (as defined in the SEC&#8217;s rules) of RadioShack common
stock for the periods indicated.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;PURCHASES

              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="12%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">---</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="12%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="81%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">These
      publicly announced plans or programs consist of RadioShack&#8217;s $250 million
      share repurchase program, which was announced on March 16, 2005, and has
      no expiration date. On August 5, 2005, we suspended purchases under the
      $250 million share repurchase program during the period in which a
      financial institution purchased shares pursuant to an overnight share
      repurchase program. During March 2007, management resumed share
      repurchases under the $250 million program; however, no shares were
      repurchased during the second and fourth quarters of 2007.&#160;For the
      twelve months ended December 31, 2007, we repurchased 8.7 million shares
      or $208.5 million of our common stock. As of December 31, 2007, there was
      $1.4 million available for share repurchases under the $250 million share
      repurchase program. During the period covered by this table, no publicly
      announced plan or program expired or was terminated, and no determination
      was made by RadioShack to suspend or cancel purchases under our
      program.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">This table should
be read in conjunction with MD&amp;A and the Consolidated Financial Statements
and related Notes.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Amounts have
      been revised. Refer to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><a href="#note2revofexpenseclass">Note 2</a> &#8211; &#8220;Summary of Significant
      Accounting Policies&#8221; under the section titled &#8220;Revision of Expense
      Classification</font>&#8221; in the Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements
      for a complete discussion regarding the revision. Further, as a result of
      the revision for years 2004 and 2003, costs of products sold increased by
      $100.8 million and $110.5 million, SG&amp;A decreased by $90.2 million and
      $97.7 million, and depreciation included in operating expenses decreased
      by $10.6 million and $12.8 million, respectively.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(2)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Capitalization
      is defined as total debt plus total stockholders'
  equity.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(3)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="82%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">EBITDA, a
      non-GAAP financial measure, is defined as earnings before interest, taxes,
      depreciation and amortization. The comparable financial measure to EBITDA
      under GAAP is net income. EBITDA is used by management to evaluate the
      operating performance of our business for comparable periods. EBITDA
      should not be used by investors or others as the sole basis for
      formulating investment decisions as it excludes a number of important
      items. We compensate for this limitation by using GAAP financial measures
      as well in managing our business. In the view of management, EBITDA is an
      important indicator of operating performance because EBITDA excludes the
      effects of financing and investing activities by eliminating the effects
      of interest and depreciation costs.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>

        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>

          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="35%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Provision for
      income taxes</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(129.8</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(38.0</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">

      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">18</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a name="Item7">ITEM 7.</a> MANAGEMENT'S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL
CONDITION AND</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;RESULTS
OF OPERATIONS (&#8220;MD&amp;A&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">This MD&amp;A
section discusses our results of operations, liquidity and financial condition,
risk management practices, critical accounting policies, and estimates and
certain factors that may affect our future results, including economic and
industry-wide factors. Our MD&amp;A should be read in conjunction with our
consolidated financial statements and accompanying notes, included in this
Annual Report on Form 10-K, as well as the Risk Factors set forth in Item 1A
above.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Subsequent to the end of 2007, we determined that we
should revise the classification of certain&#160;expenses relating to
merchandise acquisition and the operation of our distribution centers, including
depreciation, in our Consolidated Statements of Income. This revision had no
impact on previously reported operating income, net income, financial position,
stockholder's equity, comprehensive income, or cash flows from operating
activities.&#160; Our policy is, and historically has been, to capitalize
such&#160;amounts into inventory. However, historically upon capitalization of
these expenses, we increased inventory and previously decreased cost of products
sold, rather than decreasing selling, general and administrative (&#8220;SG&amp;A&#8221;)
expense where&#160;these expenses were&#160;originally recorded. As a result, we
had&#160;understated cost of products sold and overstated SG&amp;A&#160;expense
and, to a lesser extent, depreciation. We believe the revised presentation
provides consistency between our consolidated balance sheets and statements of
income by aligning the classification of our distribution costs within our
statements of income in the manner in which these costs are included in our
inventory balance.&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Refer
to </font><a href="#NOTE2REVOFEXPENSECLASS">Note 2</a> &#8211; &#8220;Summary of Significant
Accounting Policies&#8221; under the section titled &#8220;Revision of Expense
Classification<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#8221; in the Notes
to Consolidated Financial Statements for a complete discussion regarding the
revision. The following discussion and analysis has been updated to reflect this
revision.</font></font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">OVERVIEW</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Highlights related
to the year ended December 31, 2007, include:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="89%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left">
          <tr style="TEXT-ALIGN: left;">
            <td valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="85%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div><font style="FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Net sales and operating
      revenues decreased $525.8 million to $4,251.7 million, compared to the
      corresponding prior year period.&#160; Comparable&#160; store sales
      decreased 8.2%.&#160; This decline was primarily due to a sales decrease
      in our wireless and personal electronics platforms.</font></font></div>
              <div>&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="TEXT-ALIGN: left;">
            <td valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: symbol">&#183;</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="85%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Gross margin
      increased 300 basis points to 47.6% compared to the corresponding prior
      year period.&#160; This increase was primarily due to
      improved&#160;</font><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: arial">inventory
      management and a shift in our product mix.</font></div>
              <div>&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="TEXT-ALIGN: left;">
            <td valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="85%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div><font size="+0"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">SG&amp;A expense decreased
      $272.2 million to $1,538.5 million, compared to the corresponding prior
      year period.&#160; As a percentage of net sales and operating revenues,
      SG&amp;A declined 170 basis points to 36.2%.&#160; A significant portion
      of this </font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">improvement was attributable
      to decreased compensation as a result of reductions in our corporate and
      store personnel in 2006 and better management of store labor hours.&#160;
      Other factors leading to the decline of SG&amp;A included a decrase in
      professional fees driven by reduced legal costs related to our defense of
      certain class action lawsuits during 2006, as well as a reduction in the
      use of consultants.&#160; The SG&amp;A improvement also resulted from
      $44.6 million in severance and other restructuring charges recognized in
      2006, and a $14.3 million reduction of accrued vacation in 2007 in
      connection with the modification of our employee vacation policy during
      2007.</font></font></div>
              <div>&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="TEXT-ALIGN: left;">
            <td valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="85%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
              <div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Operating income
      increased $225.0 million to $381.9 million, and net income increased
      $163.4 million to $236.8 million, compared to the corresponding prior year
      period.&#160; The results for the year ended December 31, 2006, included
      pre-tax impairment charges of $44.3 million.&#160; Net income per diluated
      share was $1.74 for the year ended December 31, 2007, compared to $0.54
      for the corresponding prior year
period.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">19</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">2006
RESTRUCTURING REVIEW</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Due to negative
trends that developed in our business during calendar year 2005, we announced a
restructuring program on February 17, 2006, that contained four key
components:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 31px">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol">&#183;</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Update our
      inventory</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 30px">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td width="952">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Focus on our
      top-performing RadioShack company-operated stores, while closing 400 to
      700 RadioShack company-operated stores, and aggressively </font></div>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">relocate
      other RadioShack company-operated
stores</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 29px">
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td width="953">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Consolidate
      our distribution centers</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt">
          <tr valign="top" style="TEXT-INDENT: 9pt;">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 30px">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol">&#183;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td width="952">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Reduce our
      overhead costs</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Through December
31, 2006, we conducted a liquidation of certain inventory during the summer and
fall of 2006, and replaced underperforming merchandise with new faster-moving
merchandise. During the summer of 2006, we also focused on our top-performing
stores and completed the closure of 481 underperforming stores, reducing the
number of retail employees in connection with these closures. Additionally, we
consolidated our distribution centers in the fall of 2006. Management also
reduced our cost structure; including our advertising spend rate and our
workforce within our corporate headquarters. A number of other cost reductions
were implemented. As of December 31, 2006, we considered our restructuring
program to be substantially complete.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The 2006
restructuring affects comparability in certain areas of this MD&amp;A discussion
and is discussed where necessary.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">See &#8220;Financial
Impact of Restructuring Program&#8221; below for a discussion of the financial impact
of our 2006 restructuring program.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">RESULTS
OF OPERATIONS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">NET SALES AND
OPERATING REVENUES</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">Consolidated
net sales decreas</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">ed 11.0%
or $525.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">8</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">&#160;million
to $4,25</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">1</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">7</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">&#160;million
for the year ended December 31, 2007</font>, from <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">$4,777.5</font>
million in the corresponding prior year period. This decrease was primarily due
to a comparable store sales decline of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">8.2%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, in addition to the closure of 481
company-operated stores during June and July 2006 as part of our 2006
restructuring. Approximately 290 of the 481 stores were closed in July 2006,
with a majority of the remainder closed in the last half of June 2006. The
decrease in comparable store sales was primarily caused by a decline in our
wireless and personal electronics platform sales.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Consolidated net
sales and operating revenues for our two reportable segments and other sales are
as follows:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

provides a summary of our consolidated net sales and operating revenues by
platform and as a percent of net sales and operating revenues. These
consolidated platform sales include sales from our RadioShack company-operated
stores and kiosks, as well as other sales.</font></div>

      centers and other sales include outside sales from our service centers, in

COMPARED WITH 2006</font></div>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="3%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">31.7</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 14.55pt"></font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: arial">0.7</font></font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="22%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Net sales and
      operating&#160;</font><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: arial">revenues</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">3,637.7</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">100.0</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="3%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">4,079.8</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">100.0</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="3%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">4,480.8</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">100.0</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">To
assist in comparability, the revenue discussion presented below primarily
analyzes results excluding the closed stores in 2006.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our wireless platform (includes
postpaid and prepaid wireless handsets, commissions, residual income and
communication devices such as scanners and GPS) decreased 13.7% for the year
ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior year period.
This decrease was primarily driven by a decline in postpaid wireless sales for
our two main wireless carriers. We believe that these sales declines were the
result of increased wireless competition, a challenging wireless industry
environment, and a shift to prepaid handsets and corresponding service plans.
This decrease, however, was partially offset by increased sales of GPS products,
particularly in the fourth quarter of 2007, and prepaid wireless handset sales.
Including the effects of the 2006 store closures, wireless platform sales for
the year ended December 31, 2007, decreased 15<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.7%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">21</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our accessory platform (includes
home entertainment, wireless, music and computer accessories; media storage;
power adapters; digital imaging products and headphones) decreased 2<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">3</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. This decrease was primarily the result of declines in wireless and
home entertainment accessory sales, but partially offset by increases in media
storage and imaging accessories sales. Including the effects of the 2006 store
closures, accessory platform sales for the year ended December 31, 2007,
decreased <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">5.7%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our personal electronics platform
(includes digital cameras, digital music players, toys, satellite radios,
camcorders, general radios, and wellness products) decreased <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">11.7%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. This decrease was driven primarily by sales declines in satellite
radios and digital music players, but was partially offset by increased sales of
video gaming products. Including the effects of the 2006 store closures,
personal electronics platform sales for the year ended December 31, 2007,
decreased <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">13.7%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our modern home platform (includes
residential telephones, home audio and video end-products, direct-to-home
(&#8220;DTH&#8221;) satellite systems, and computers) decreased 5.7<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%,</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. This decrease was the result of sales declines in residential
telephones, and DVD players and recorders, offset by increased sales of laptop
computers, PC peripherals, and flash drives. Including the effects of the 2006
store closures, modern home platform sales for the year ended December 31, 2007,
decreased 8.3<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our power platform (includes
general and special purpose batteries and battery chargers) decreased 5.6<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. This sales decline was the result of decreased sales of general
purpose and special purpose telephone batteries. Including the effects of the
2006 store closures, power platform sales for the year ended December 31, 2007,
decreased 8<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.6%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our technical platform (includes
wire and cable, connectivity products, components and tools, as well as hobby
and robotic products) decreased <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">2.2%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. This sales decline was due primarily to a decrease in sales of
robotic kits, metal detectors and tools, partially offset by an increase in
audio cable sales. Including the effects of the 2006 store closures, technical
platform sales for the year ended December 31, 2007, decreased 6<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.9%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Excluding the
effects of the 2006 store closures, sales in our service platform (includes
prepaid wireless airtime, extended service plans and bill payment revenue)
decreased 2<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">6</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior
year period. Prepaid airtime sales increased for the year ended December 31,
2007; however, this gain was more than offset by decreases in bill payment
revenue. Including the effects of the 2006 store closures, service platform
sales for the year ended December 31, 2007, decreased 4<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">9</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Other revenue
(includes RS company-operated store repair revenue and other revenue) decreased
$4.0 million or 22.9% for the year ended December 31, 2007, compared to the
prior year, due in part to the 2006 store closures and to a decline in store
repair revenue.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">22</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Kiosks</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Kiosk sales consist
primarily of handset sales, postpaid and prepaid commission revenue and related
wireless accessory sales. Kiosk sales decreased 12.8% or $43.5 million for the
year ended December 31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior year
period. While this decrease is partially attributable to fewer kiosk locations
compared to the prior year, we believe that this sales decline was primarily the
result of increased wireless competition, a challenging wireless industry
environment, and a customer shift to prepaid handsets which are generally priced
lower than postpaid handsets.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Other
Sales</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Other sales include
sales to our independent dealers, outside sales through our service centers,
sales generated by our <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">www.radioshack.com</font>
Web site, sales to our Mexican joint venture, sales to commercial customers,
outside sales of our global sourcing operations and manufacturing facilities
and, in 2006, sales of our now closed Canadian company-operated stores. Other
sales were down <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">$40.2</font>
million or 11.3<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff">%</font>
for the year ended December 31, 2007, respectively, when compared to the
corresponding prior year period. This sales decrease was primarily due to the
sale or closure of five service centers late in the second quarter of 2006,
fewer dealer outlets in 2007, and a decline in product sales to the remaining
dealers.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">GROSS
PROFIT</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Consolidated gross
profit and gross margin are as follows:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2,025.8</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="25%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Gross profit
      decrease</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            <td valign="bottom" width="25%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;

            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="25%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Gross
      margin</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">47.6</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">44.6</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">44.6</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Consolidated gross
profit and gross margin for the year ended December 31, 2007, were $2,025.8
million and 47.6%, respectively, compared with $2,129.4 million and 44.6% in the
corresponding prior year period, resulting in a 4.9% decrease in gross profit
dollars and a 300 basis point increase in our gross margin.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The
decrease in gross profit for the year ended December 31, 2007, was the result of
a decline in net sales and operating revenues primarily due to a comparable
store sales decrease and store closures associated with our 2006 restructuring.
</font>Our 2007 gross margin increased primarily due to an improvement in our
inventory management and a shift in product mix. In addition, refunds of $14.0
million and $5.2 million for federal telecommunications excise taxes were
recorded in the first and fourth quarters of 2007, respectively. A portion of
these refunds totaling $18.8 million was recorded as a reduction to cost of
products sold, which accounted for a 44 basis point increase in our gross
margin. See <a href="#NOTE12">Note 12 </a>&#8211; &#8220;Federal Excise Tax&#8221; for a
discussion of the impact of the federal telecommunications excise
tax.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">23</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">SELLING, GENERAL
AND ADMINISTRATIVE (&#8220;SG&amp;A&#8221;) EXPENSE</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Our consolidated
SG&amp;A expense decreased 15.0% or $272.2 million for the year ended December
31, 2007, when compared to the corresponding prior year period. This represents
a 170 basis point decrease as a percentage of net sales and operating revenues
compared to the corresponding prior year period.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The table below
summarizes the breakdown of various components of our consolidated SG&amp;A
expense and its related percentage of total net sales and operating
revenues.</font></div>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="bottom" width="32%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">37.9</font></td>

            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">35.5</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">%</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Amounts have
      been revised. Refer to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><a href="#note2revofexpenseclass">Note 2</a> &#8211; &#8220;Summary of Significant
      Accounting Policies&#8221; under the section titled &#8220;Revision of Expense
      Classification</font>&#8221; in the Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements
      for a complete discussion.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Payroll and
commissions expense decreased in dollars and as a percentage of net sales and
operating revenues. This decrease was primarily driven by a reduction in our
corporate support staff, a reduction of store personnel from store closures in
2006, and better management of store labor hours. Additionally, compensation
included an $8.5 million charge recorded in the first quarter of 2007 associated
with the reduction of approximately 280 corporate support employees, while the
year ended December 31, 2006, included employee separation charges of
approximately $16.1 million connected with the 2006 restructuring. Furthermore,
our accrued vacation was reduced $14.3 million during the year ended December
31, 2007, in connection with the modification of our employee vacation policy
during 2007.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Rent expense
decreased in dollars, but increased as a percent of net sales and operating
revenues. The rent decrease was primarily driven by store closures from our 2006
restructuring.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Advertising expense
decreased in dollars, but increased as a percent of net sales and operating
revenues. This decrease was primarily due to a change in our media strategy, as
we changed the mix of media used in our advertising program from television to
more radio and newspaper usage, as well as reduced sponsorship
programs.</font></div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">24</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><a href="#TableofContents">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Professional fees
decreased in both dollars and as a percent of net sales and operating revenues.
The decrease relates to a decline in our use of consultants and lower fees
incurred as a result of our defense of certain class action lawsuits during
2006, as well as prior year recognition of $5.1 million of the $8.8 million
charge to establish a legal reserve for the settlement of these lawsuits. See <a href="#NOTE13">Note 13 </a>&#8211; &#8220;Litigation&#8221; in the Notes to Consolidated Financial
Statements for a discussion of these lawsuits.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">DEPRECIATION AND
AMORTIZATION</font></div>

gives a summary of our total depreciation and amortization by
segment.</font></div>

            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">112.7</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">128.2</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="6%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">123.8</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Amounts have
      been retrospectively adjusted to conform to current year presentations.
      Certain prior year amounts have been reallocated between the segments and
      other business activities and the unallocated
  category.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

provides an analysis of total depreciation and amortization.</font></div>
